item.title: Americans are ordering steaks but passing on fine dining, says Olive Garden’s owner
item.description: America’s taste for red meat over fine dining powered a healthy sales gain for LongHorn Steakhouse.

item.title: Some Republicans want a bigger child tax credit. Does it have a chance of becoming reality?
item.description: As Republicans get ready to deliver a tax package next year, some prominent GOP lawmakers have voiced support for an expanded child tax credit.

item.title: Elon Musk’s government shutdown? Here’s what it means for TSA, IPOs and Social Security.
item.description: As U.S. lawmakers wrangle over spending legislation, here’s how some key government functions would be affected by a shutdown.

item.title: The No. 1 New Year’s resolution isn’t losing weight or exercising — it’s this financial goal, surveys say
item.description: Wealth is topping health among many people’s 2025 goals. Here’s how to stick to your financial resolutions.

item.title: Why stock-market volatility spike signals Wednesday’s rout could be buying opportunity
